snowCatTour.cardText: Join this special sightseeing tour on the mystical Snæfellsjökull Glacier. Through a scenic mountain pass, we reach the foot of the glacier where you can jump aboard our very own orange snow-cat to start your adventure on Snæfellsjökull glacier.
snowCatTour.imageAlt: Sunset from the top of Snaefellsjokull

glacierInfo: Discover the mystical powers of the magnificent Snæfellsjökull. Come along on this fantastic tour of a glacier that sits on top of a 700.000-year-old stratovolcano. Snæfellsjökull is one of the most famous sites in Iceland both the glacier and the area around is said to hold mystical energy, the feeling of standing on a glacier which sits above a mighty volcano is second to none. The incredible views from the glacier will provide fantastic photo opportunities and lasting memories. Those looking for an exciting adventure should not miss this excursion.
